title: Discussion-Based Learning Skill Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment fostered through learner interaction, conducted in a smartphone-centric, technology-constrained setting.

learning_goals: Learners can improve their ability to analyze discussion topics and construct logical arguments by at least 80%
Learners can improve communication skills by at least 70% by incorporating peer feedback
Learners can strengthen self-directed learning motivation by at least 60% through discussion processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
